sentences.en: This has posed a problem for manufactures.

sentences.en: I fully agree the problem posed by Unilever.

sentences.en: I'll think about the two questions that you posed.

sentences.en: She posed as an expert in old coin.

sentences.en: I'm more beautiful in real life than in posed pictures.

sentences.en: Despite the ever-present dangers posed by environmental toxins,

sentences.en: He is wildly exaggerating the threat posed by terrorism.
sentences.vi: Ông ta phóng đại hết cỡ mối đe đọa khủng bố.

sentences.en: The teacher posed a question to one of her class.

sentences.en: The players strutted and posed for the cameras.
sentences.vi: Các cầu thủ tiến lên một cách hênh ngang và đứng lại cho đám đông chụp hình.

sentences.en: The threat posed by Iran has been grossly exaggerated.
sentences.vi: Mối đe dọa từ Iran được phóng đại hết sức.

sentences.en: She posed in the nude for a photographer.

sentences.en: The detective posed as a mourner at the victim's funeral.

sentences.en: You were sup-posed to write last month.

sentences.en: The internal conflicts have posed an enormous challenge to the international community.

sentences.en: This was a miscellany of answers to the myriad questions posed by children.

sentences.en: The two leaders discussed the danger posed by an upsurge of extreme nationalism.

sentences.en: The economic reforms also posed new challenges to women’s rights and gender equality.
